name: PADDED MOTO DENIM JACKET
description: Rev up your outerwear inventory with our unrivalled collection of coats and jackets for men. Whether you are looking for a heavy coat to combat the low temperatures or a lightweight jacket to stand out at your favourite festival, we've got the trendiest designs to finish off your outfit. Puffers, parkas and borg jackets are the perfect choices if you want to bundle up without sacrificing on style, and they look great when teamed up with knitwear and denim. Bombers and overcoats are beyond versatile and can turn any getup from laid-back to dapper in no time. Denim jackets can't be missing in your trans-seasonal wardrobe, whilst cagoules and coach jackets will keep out the chill while you're out and about.

name: EXTREME BAGGY RIGID MULTI POCKET JEANS
description: Covering that grey area between smart and casual, jeans are always a solid option when it comes to men's outfits. Jeans are the ultimate staple in every guy's fashion line-up, and they go with just about anything to create a go-to look. Our range of menâ€™s jeans gives you the chance to elevate your daily outfit. Whether you prefer skinny denim or you rate a loose fit more, make sure you secure your denim selects here. Dress them down with a hoodie and white trainers, or dress them up with a blazer and slip-ons.

name: FAUX FUR TRIM GILET
description: It's gilet season - the perfect companion for those colder days. A padded sleeveless jacket resembling a waistcoat design, our women's gilets have got you covered this winter. Snug, sophisticated and always in style, team a fitted body warmer with a fresh crop top and high waisted mom jeans for a crisp autumnal look. Perfect for layering, grab your go-to heeled boots and faux leather trousers and slip into a shaggy faux fur gilet for snug winter wanders. Need something cosier for your off-duty days? Layer a padded style over your fave roll neck and joggers, and get ready to relax.

name: FAUX FUR FLUFFY EAR MUFFS
description: Stay warm and fabulous and grab our all-weather worthy collection of women's hats, scarves and gloves. Looking good in layers has never been easier with edgy beret hats or beanies. Grab a wrap-able chunky knit scarf from a women's scarves edit - it's the perfect layer for that new coat you just bought. Finish off the look and keep your hands warm with our women's gloves - from leather to knitted, add a serious colour pop to your 'fit.

name: CHECK CHUNKY TASSEL FRINGE SCARF
description: Stay warm and fabulous and grab our all-weather worthy collection of women's hats, scarves and gloves. Looking good in layers has never been easier with edgy beret hats or beanies. Grab a wrap-able chunky knit scarf from a women's scarves edit - it's the perfect layer for that new coat you just bought. Finish off the look and keep your hands warm with our women's gloves - from leather to knitted, add a serious colour pop to your 'fit.

name: COLLARLESS MAXI WOOL LOOK COAT
description: Wrap up warm in the latest wool look coats. A stylish way to cover up from the colder weather, wool coats work on off-duty days as well as those nights out with the girls. A warm and durable classic that mimics a sheep's wool blend and is perfect for winter, try slouchy silhouettes, military styles or checked prints. For that extra elevated finish, pick a wool look jacket with a faux fur collar or tailored fit to really up your style game.

name: TEDDY MITTEN GLOVES
description: Stay warm and fabulous and grab our all-weather worthy collection of women's hats, scarves and gloves. Looking good in layers has never been easier with edgy beret hats or beanies. Grab a wrap-able chunky knit scarf from a women's scarves edit - it's the perfect layer for that new coat you just bought. Finish off the look and keep your hands warm with our women's gloves - from leather to knitted, add a serious colour pop to your 'fit.

name: CABLE KNIT LEG WARMERS
description: You can never have too many tights and socks. Discover our selection of women's tights, from go-to all black tights to fishnets, opaque and bold patterns. Why not be colourful and playful with our women's socks, with everything from retro ruffle cuffs to sports socks. Make outfits interesting by teaming trainers with glitter socks or wearing lace tights with patterned dresses for a statement finish.

name: OVERSIZED CROP WOOL BOMBER JACKET
description: Keep things casual but always on-trend with a piece of outerwear perfection, the bomber jacket. A light jacket featuring a gathered, ribbed waistband and matching cuffs, a bomber jacket is versatile, timeless, and the perfect way to edge up your casual wear. Wear your new women's bomber jacket with a shirt and stripe joggers for the hottest look of the moment: sports luxe, or layer a varsity jacket over a t shirt dress for a fresh new-season look.

name: SLOUCHY OVERSIZED CARDIGAN
description: Who needs a plus one when you've got the perfect boyfriend cardigan, girl. For those days when you've nailed your casual outfit and you just need something extra to serve looks, throw on an oversized style boyfriend cardigan and bring new energy to your vibe. Typically v-neck, this loose, longer style of cardigan is designed so it looks too big. From softer finer knit cardigans and cosy cable knits to classic black and more eye-popping hues, these cardigans have serious add-to-bag potential, so grab one in every style and colour. You'll need them with your busy social schedule.

name: CAP SLEEVE SEAM DETAIL LONGLINE TOP
description: Steal the style top spot in a statement separate from the women's tops collection. Covering the chest and upper body, there's no denying tops are the wardrobe basic everyone loves. Camis or crops, bandeaus or bralets, we've got all the trend-setting tops so you can stay statement in separates this season. Hit refresh on your jersey basics with pastel hues and pick a quirky kimono to give your ensemble an Eastern-inspired edge. Off the shoulder styles are oh-so-sweet, with slogans making your tee a talking point.
